result.title: Abrupt Runtime Error on PyPy
result.content:
Hi There !!

Attempted to solve this question: http://codeforces.com/contest/902/submission/33428524 Here is my solution: http://codeforces.com/contest/902/submission/33428524

Got an abrupt runtime error !!! That too on the 25th test case.

PLEASE HELP !!!
